channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dollar Tree lifts earnings forecasts as consumers seek out bargains
India is set to host Russia's Putin, deepening trade ties, unfazed by punitive U.S. tariffs
item.description: The two countries are looking to strengthen trade ties and are likely to sign bilateral interdepartmental and business agreements during Putin's visit...

item.title: Hugo Boss stock slumps after clothing company's profit warning
Putin threatens Europe with war if it wants one, as Ukraine peace talks falter
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin doubled down on threats toward Europe ahead of peace talks with the U.S., saying Moscow was "ready" for war.

item.title: Reasons to be optimistic about the S&P 500’s worst-performing stocks
Gold, silver and copper prices are soaring to records. More gains could follow.
Trump takes aim at Biden pardons with new autopen directive
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he is terminating all documents, including pardons, that he said his predecessor Joe Biden had signed usin...

item.title: Truth Social operator Trump Media settles legal dispute with co-founders
item.description: Trump Media operates the Truth Social app frequently used by President Donald Trump.

item.title: USDA secretary threatens to cut funding to blue states over alleged SNAP data noncompliance
item.description: The Trump administration threatened to cut off federal funding to blue states over their alleged refusal to share SNAP program data.

item.title: Why Marvell’s stock is soaring toward its best day in months after earnings
